concept.title: Accessibility
concept.shortdesc:
DITA has markup and features that facilitate preparing content for use by all audiences.This is not the right spot to have the content - we've discussed grouping accessiblity + localization as a "chapter" of sorts - I'm just dropping it here as a starting point to be moved once we set up that chapter.
An alternate shortdesc: "DITA has markup and features that enable producing output that is accessible by all audiences."
